eosim::graphic::MoveAction

eosim::graphic::MoveAction Struct Reference
[Graphic Simulations]

#include <eosim/graphic/Display.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Movement Action of a Sprite.

Author:
Bruno Martínez, Fernando Pardo and Sebastián Alaggia
Version:
1.1.1
Date:
2005
This struct is used to assign movements to the sprites. The function MoveAction::move is used to add more moves to an Sprite.
